snippet: SAYPOL--Ron. A man of grace, grit, generosity, and unfailing good humor. And how he loved our dear friend Florence. We will remember him and we will miss him. Becca and Peter...
lead_paragraph:
SAYPOL--Ron. A man of grace, grit, generosity, and unfailing good humor. And how he loved our dear friend Florence. We will remember him and we will miss him.

Becca and Peter
